author: CNN Staff
title: Tips for surviving isolation from a man who spent a year in space
description: After spending a year in space, Scott Kelly is an expert on managing extreme isolation. The retired astronaut shares valuable advice with CNN Chief Medical Correspondent Dr. Sanjay Gupta on how to cope with social separation here on Earth.
content:
